tool_description: Traces the exhibition history of an artwork across museums, galleries, and other venues to build a comprehensive display timeline and verify ownership periods.
error_messages: Invalid year range: end_year must be greater than or equal to start_year.
Invalid venue type: Venue types must be from [museum, gallery, art_fair, auction_preview, private_exhibition, artist_studio].
Unsupported region: One or more geographic regions are not supported.
Exhibition database unavailable: Unable to access exhibition databases at this time.
usage: Search for exhibition records of the artwork to build a comprehensive display history. This helps verify ownership periods and provides additional provenance evidence.

exhibition_venues.description: Names of venues that displayed the artwork

major_exhibitions.description: Notable or major exhibitions featuring the artwork

lending_institutions.description: Institutions or individuals who lent the artwork
